"A.P.238/4/9/11:00": "Ah, testing. What am I saying? It's not like I need a microphone!"
"I'll just use the power of my photons to project my voice out to everyone!"
"Anyways, I am Huey of the Council of Six, and I'm the one in charge of this event and your future in ARKS."
"Since I'm on the monitor, I can't see your reactions..."
"But I'm sure you're all amazed and astounded to see me!"
"I'd like to thank you for attending this event, but then again it wasn't exactly voluntary now was it?"
"This event is going to be great. Not necessarily for you, mostly for me watching you little bastards trying to keep your jobs."
"Anyways, don't worry about the rules in this event, there's only one thing to be concerned about."
"That is to be stronger than anyone else."
"Wait? What are you? I'm in the middle of a speech right now."
"Hey, get out of the way, I'm also part of the event staff too this time."
"Fufufu, hey all ARKS can hear my voice, right?"
"My name is Claris Claes, Number five in the Council and one of the Three Heroes."
"I've been participating in the planning of this event and I hope you all have fun."
"I have a special present waiting for anyone who makes it to the end of the trial."
"Hey Claris Claes, don't give away the climax! We need to hold off a little longer for that!"
"Anyways, it's almost time to commence."
"And Claris Claes, we agreed that you wouldn't say anything not scripted."
"I know that!"
"The let the ARKS Battle Championship-"
"Begin!"
